# envMRMEGAfm

This is an R package for environment-adjusted MR-MEGA fine-mapping
approach.

Website available: <https://SiruRooney.github.io/envMRMEGAfm/>

For more details, please see:

## System requirements

env.MRmega could be installed with ease on versions of R \> 4.3.0.

## Installation

Before installing **envMRMEGAfm** R package , the following packages
from CRAN are required:

``` r
install.packages("data.table")
install.packages("doParallel")
install.packages("dplyr")
install.packages("foreach")
install.packages("parallel")
install.packages("stats")
```

You can install the GitHub version of **envMRMEGAfm** and the
**envMRMEGAfm** R package installation can be finished in 1 minute:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("SiruRooney/envMRMEGAfm")
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`Calc_condBF()`](Calc_condBF.md) : Conditional Bayesian factors
- [`Get_GenInverse()`](Get_GenInverse.md) : The inverse of the matrix
- [`MRMEGAout`](MRMEGAout.md) : The meta-analysis output from MR-MEGA
- [`MR_mega_run()`](MR_mega_run.md) : environment-adjusted MR-MEGA
  approach or MR-MEGA approach.
- [`envMRMEGAout`](envMRMEGAout.md) : The environment-adjusted
  meta-analysis output from env-MR-MEGA
- [`env_MR_MEGA_fm()`](env_MR_MEGA_fm.md) : (env-)MR-MEGA fine-mapping
  approach (env-MR-MEGAfm)
- [`gwas.list`](gwas.list.md) : GWAS files
- [`ld.list`](ld.list.md) : The linkage disequilibrium (LD) matrices
- [`lr_env_w()`](lr_env_w.md) : The weighted environment-adjusted linear
  regression.
- [`lr_w()`](lr_w.md) : The weighted linear regression.
- [`meta_sel_condest()`](meta_sel_condest.md) : Conditional analysis of
  the linear regression model
- [`meta_sel_joinest()`](meta_sel_joinest.md) : Joint analysis of a
  linear regression model
- [`pcs`](pcs.md) : Two axes of genetic variation.
- [`read_gwasld()`](read_gwasld.md) : Read-in GWAS files and LD
  structures
- [`sexsmk`](sexsmk.md) : The smoking proportions across the 10 sex
  stratified populations.
